description: This file defines the FavoritesPage widget for a Flutter app, which displays a list of user's favorite recipes using provider for state management.

classes.name: FavoritesPage
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays the user's favorite recipes in a list view.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the FavoritesPage, displaying either a message if no favorites are saved or a list of favorite recipes.
